alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 3:49PM CST until December 08 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain showers and freezing drizzle. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Trego and Ellis Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even very light icing can create slick sidewalks and elevated surfaces. Dense fog or freezing fog is also likely, reducing visibility below one half mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
